description: The Doctor and Clara cross paths with Oscar Wilde and Calamity Jane in the frontier town of Deadwood as they pay their respects to the recently passed Wild Bill Hickok. But soon they will discover the grave is empty and that the town is being plagued by a masked gunman who shoots his victims with nothing but a finger!
name: Dead Man's Hand: Part 1

volume.name: Doctor Who: The Eleventh Doctor Archives

description: Clara and Calamity Jane have been shot dead by a reanimated Wild Bill Hickok - but how? And does this relate to Thomas Edison's secret research site in the Black Hills? And why doesn't Oscar Wild care if he dies? Only the Doctor knows, and he's not telling!
name: Dead Man's Hand: Part 2

volume.name: Doctor Who: The Eleventh Doctor Archives

description: The judgement is made, and Earth is doomed! Can the Doctor and Oscar Wilde convince an alien with a vendetta to change his mind? Meanwhile, Clara and Calamity Jane track down Wild Bill Hickok in an effort to unearth the truth behind the gunfighter's return.
name: Dead Man's Hand: Part 3

volume.name: Doctor Who: The Eleventh Doctor Archives

description: The people of Deadwood are fighting zombie gunfighters and cross-dimensional alien invaders! Oscar Wilde debating for Earth's very existence! Wild Bill Hickok, Calamity Jane, and Clara in a suicidal stagecoach attack! Thomas Edison's redemption! And the Doctor, sacrificing everything one last time... but is it enough?
name: Dead Man's Hand: Part 4

volume.name: Doctor Who: The Eleventh Doctor Archives

description:
Souichiro Hino's mother may be a world famous psychic, but she sure has trouble keeping track of everyday details. For example, that 'wonderful' new school she sent him to was embroiled in a string of grisly murders. All of the victims were male students like Souichiro. Nor did she mention that fellow psychic and childhood friend, Itsuki Aoyama, attended the school and was expecting him to do something about all of that. And then there was Itsuki's Love Club, also known as the Ghostbusters. Somehow, his friend had gotten it into his head that a random group of kids - and one friendly spirit of a dead honor student - could take on and defeat The Seven Mysteries of Seika Academy, which actually numbered ten or more. Souichiro didn't have time to object. There was a killer Sakura tree in the garden and a portal to hell in the Emergency Stairwell. If all of this wasn't bad enough, there was that 'connection' between him and Itsuki. They hadn't seen each other for years, yet everyone treated them like a couple! Souko Hino sure had a lot of explaining to do!

Chapter One - Four.
name: Vol. 1

description:
Souichiro Hino and Itsuki Aoyama and their Love Club, aka 'Ghostbusters,' think their biggest problems are solving and defeating The Seven Mysteries of Seika Academy. Souichiro sure thinks that enough for them to worry about. However, there seems to be more than seven mysteries. Not even Itsuki knows how many there may actually be, or when they might pop up and suck them into another dimension. On top of all that, there are the mysteries that come to visit on their own. First, there is the new school doctor who turns out to be a flesh eating demon with family problems. And then, there is the ghost of a little girl chasing the ghost of a little kitten. Somehow, they are connected to the teacher that's gone berserk and keeps chasing Love Club members with a broom. As Souichiro is in a near constant battle for his life and dodging the affections of all the wrong guys, he often wonders why his mother, world famous psychic, Souko Hino, thought this school was a good idea!

Chapter Five - Seven and LOVE CLUB SPECIAL DEAR MY FRIEND.
name: Vol. 2

description:
Accepting the post of Royal Tutor at the court of the king of Grannzreich, Heine Wittgenstein is a little professor with a big job ahead! Each of the kingdom's four princes has a rather distinct personality. Does their diminutive new instructor have what it takes to lay down some learning? It's a comedy of educational proportions!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 1: The Royal Tutor Arrives!
  • Chapter 2: Interview with a Prince I
  • Chapter 3: Interview with a Prince II
  • Chapter 4: Interview with a Prince III
  • Chapter 5: Interview with a Prince IV
  • Chapter 6: You Needn't Welcome Me
  • Chapter 7: The Princes' Secret!?
name: Vol. 1

description:
When the king returns to court, it's time for the princes to prove their mettle. But not everyone's been exactly keeping up with Heine's lessons... (Hint: It's the prince who only scored a one on his assessment test...and that was for signing his name!) Can Heine really whip these boys into shape well enough to rule a country?

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 8: The Princes, Out on the Town!
  • Chapter 9: Beset by the Greatest of Trials
  • Chapter 10: Most Solemn Studying
  • Chapter 11: A Cowardly Heart
  • Chapter 12: Brothers
name: Vol. 2

description:
The first volume in the prequel series to the manga Akame Ga Kill! Follows the life of the title character Akame while she was still an Imperial Assassin

Plot Summary

To suppress rebellions throughout the country, the Empire's special intelligence division devises a plan to create master assassins. Over 100 children are bought and put through a brutal gauntlet, then divided into either the elite or majority group. The elite team were raised and trained by a master assassin in a false town created for the purpose of shaping them into exceptional killers, while the majority group are trained differently and enhanced with experimental drugs.

The book begins with a mission led by two of the elite group, Akame & Tsukushi to infiltrate and eliminate a circus troupe that may be composed of rebels. Afterwards, a chapter focusing on Akame's initiation into the assassination program and her separation from her sister Kurome.

After completing their training, the elite team are sent after individual targets as a final test, while Akame is given a particularly heartless order to test her mettle. Kurome's cell are also sent on their first mission, and when the elite team are sent after an aristocrat funding the rebel army, the rebels' counterattack begins.

Contents

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 1: Two Girls
  • Chapter 2: The Day of Beginnings
  • Chapter 3: First Mission (Part 1)
  • Chapter 4: First Mission (Part 2)
  • Chapter 5: Raised in Darkness
  • Chapter 6: Challenge! Kill the Viceroy
name: Volume 1

description:
Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 7: The Battle of Hakurou River
  • Chapter 8: Chance Meeting
  • Chapter 9: Assassins
  • Chapter 10: Fight to the Death (Part 1)
  • Chapter 11: Fight to the Death (Part 2)
  • Chapter 12: First Casualty
  • Chapter 13: Clash of the Best
name: Volume 2

description:
Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 14: Remains
  • Chapter 15: Mysteries
  • Chapter 16: _
  • Chapter 17: Plunge
  • Chapter 18: Melee
  • Chapter 19: Number 1
  • Chapter 20: Length
name: Volume 3

volume.name: Vampirella vs. Lady Death: The End
Hercules vs. The Financial Empire of Metro Bank

name: Rip Kirby em "O Roubo das Esmeraldas"

volume.name: Roy Rogers e o Trigger: Suplemento ao Mundo de Aventuras

description:
Summon the Devil

In the Chicago of the 1920s, most teenagers spend Halloween attending small parties and traveling door to door for the homemade treats of neighbors and strangers alike. However, two elite prep' school sociopaths, Ford and Campbell, begin an adventure to discover the truth behind summoning the Devil.
name: Summon the Devil

description:
Protect and Serve

Tony and friends use ingenuity and brute force to protect the citizens of Bayside Heights from a vicious gang.
name: Protect and Serve

description: After an intense training session inside the Batcave, Tim Drake settles in for a normal day at work, teaching science at a small private school. But just as the class field trip to Wayne Industries begins, things take a violent turn...
name: The Apprentice Part 1 of 2

description: Jen learns not to expect affection from her monsters, and Mags and Dani begin a very awkward courtship.

The Yellow Orchid

Crammed with mystic mushrooms, courtesy of their pervert shamas Lo Hung, our heroes Colt Buckshot & Jackson Dupagne, DOUBLE BARREL, are transported into their own Noir nightmare!

What kind of hope can our humble hop heads provide the ultimate damsel in distress? None other than the curvaceously impressive: Vivian Remington Busch III!
name: The Yellow Orchid

description:
The all-out war between the Boroughs, Ma, Jones, and the Saints of Nowhere gains a mysterious new faction, named "The Devil's Chorus." Can Sam navigate the gang war and prove his innocence in a murder he was framed for before it's too late?

Note: The digital edition (8/19/2015) for this issue was released before the print edition.

After learning more about Zandalee's life Kain decides to teach her how to control her abilities. When Kain has to leave abruptly Zandalee follows him and finds out that he knows a lot more about the supernatural than he's letting on.

FROM RUSSIA WITH LOVE

Greydon defends the town of TUTIS from a patrol of demons, unbeknown to him, hidden within the caravan of human slaves, is DMITRI, the monarch of the realm that possesses the same incredible powers as Greydon. The two men clash in an epic battle, each a match for the other on strength, but does Greydon have the skill to defeat such an adversary?
name: From Russia With Love

description:
In this issue...

STEVEN MOFFAT PREVIEWS THE NEW SERIES OF DOCTOR WHO, EXCLUSIVELY IN DWM 490!

Doctor Who Magazine spoke to the show's executive producer and head writer, Steven Moffat, to give us a taste of what's in store over the next 12 episodes...

"Why not start with a blockbuster? says Steven of the two-part opening story, The Magicians Apprentice and The Witchs Familiar. "Why leave it till the last two weeks? So yes, its like starting with a finale, and having a big, grand, movie-sized story, as opposed to a 45-minute story."

What does Steven like about the longer format? "It allows you to play with certain things," he replies. "There's a kind of scale that you can attain in a two-parter, that you can't have in 45 minutes. It's a scale that we're not used to at the moment, as we haven't done two-parters for quite a while. And in a way, it's sort of advertising the fact that we've got two-parters back this year. We do things in that first episode that I would say are very 'two-parter-y'."

ALSO INSIDE ISSUE 490...

  • THE SECRET DIARY OF THE MASTER!
    Hes mad, bad and dangerous to know and now, DWM has discovered the secret diary of the Master, which reveals the insane thinking behind his... er, her every scheme!
  • LOST IN TRANSLATION
    Why does nearly everyone in Doctor Who speak English? Steve Lyons investigates the mystery of universal translation throughout the history of the series and comes to some intriguing conclusions...
  • THE NAME OF THE DOCTOR?
    Showrunner Steven Moffat answers more readers questions and presents a brand new scene which explores what the Doctor called himself during the Time War...
  • THE VAMPIRE MUTATIONS
    The Fourth Doctor and Romana encounter creatures with a thirst for blood and an ancient enemy of the Time Lords as the The Fact of Fiction explores the 1980 story State of Decay.
  • THE RETURN OF DANNY PINK
    Clara has a shocking reunion with her boyfriend in the brand-new comic strip adventure, Spirits of the Jungle, by Jonathan Morris, illustrated by John Ross.
  • TRAILS AND TRIBULATIONS
    Novelist, fan girl, and mum Jacqueline Rayner celebrates the joy of a new Doctor Who trailer in her regular column, Relative Dimensions.
  • ITS THE END...
    The Time Team embark on a marathon viewing session as they sit down to watch David Tennants swansong as the Doctor: The End of Time.
  • THE COMPLETE HISTORY
    DWM takes a look at a landmark new series of books, which begins in September: Doctor Who The Complete History.
  • ON THEIR WAY...
    DWM talks to the people involved in the latest Doctor Who CD and book releases, including Dan Starkey, James Goss and Gary Russell.
  • THE UNEXPLAINED
    The Watcher examines some of the many unanswered questions in Doctor Who and celebrates a feisty equine talent in Wotcha!.
  • PLUS! All the latest official news, reviews, competitions and The DWM Crossword.

Doctor Who Magazine 490 is on sale now!
Villains and Heroes flee as two powerful fighters go toe-to-toe. Chaos and destruction rain down on the city. Also, Zipman quickly discovers that a friend might be out to get him.

Natalie

Natalie has such a bright future ahead of her in the photography industry, but when she see's her old love Garan in a London train station she cannot help but reminisce on her past and reconsider her future.
name: Natalie

description:
Lost and Found

As two heroes and two villains are hunted for sport on a bizarre Exotic Game planet, things take a surprising turn when Captain Scarr, space pirate, shows up looking for treasure. Will she save them - or join in the hunt?

Meanwhile, in the special bonus section, remember when Desdemona almost married Elastic man -- just to teach her husband a lesson? It happened. And the entire story is right here.
name: The Big Hunt Part 3: Lost & Found

description:
Death and Documentaries

When Jacob decides to retire, he realizes that neither the Genocide Project nor the terrorists they fight are going to let him just walk away.
name: Chapter 2 - Death and Documentaries

description:
The Blue Hell

In which Carol is on the highway to hell. Last issue! EVER! Until I make more.
name: The Blue Hell

description:
Deer Hunters

In post-apocalyptic Canada, guns don't kill people - slapshots do.

For the mutated tribes trying to survive nuclear winter - which is like normal Canadian winter, just more radioactive - hockey serves as a form of ritual warfare in which communities gamble their resources on the abilities of their squad to score goals and bust heads on the ice.

The unwritten code of the post-apocalypse is broken when the Red Deer steal the Atomics' megapotato. Chaos reigns as the Atomics embark on a deer hunt to regain their starchy prize and, just maybe, quell the growing dissent about hockey being the solution to all problems.
name: Deer Hunters

description:
Bloodlines Part 3 of 3

Fated to never lay eyes upon his newborn son, Hiro Sato lies in the middle of main street, shot down dead in an honor duel. Meanwhile, the newborn child's mother, Annabelle Baker, convalesces at Madame Claude's. Judah Baker, Hiro Sato's killer and Annabelle's father, comes to collect his wayward daughter.

Backed by a torch-bearing mob, Judah is faced with blade and bullet, knuckle and blood. John Henry and the denizens of Madame Claude's fight to buy time for Hiro Sato's father, Hiroshi Sato, as he absconds with Annabelle and Sun Sato, his newborn

grandson, while Madame Claude anxiously awaits them with horses out back.

Amidst the chaos of the barroom melee and in the heart of a raging inferno, Judah fights to secure his fleeing daughter against her wishes. But before he can do so, Judah must confront his old friend and compatriot, Hiroshi Sato, who has sworn to protect his "daughter-in-law" and her newborn son from her own father.

With a duel between the most bad-ass grandpas east of Golden Gate City, thus concludes...
name: Bloodlines Part 3 of 3

description: The Marvel Chess Collection is a bi-weekly series featuring some of the greatest Marvel characters. The second set in the Marvel Chess Collection features the X-Men. Continue your collection with Cyclops (White King) (#38), Magneto (Black King) (#39), Rogue (White Bishop) (#40), and Daken (Black Pawn) (#41).
name: Magneto [Black King]

description:
76 Action-Packed Pages in the Mighty Marvel Manner!

Captain America and Falcon take on the one-man army known as Nuke!

Also: Howard Stark takes the fight to the alien Greys, and 451 reveals his plan to Iron Man!

Plus: having defeated Gorr, the God Butcher, Thor returns to Midgard and makes a shocking discovery!

By Rick Remender, Nic Klein, Kieron Gillen, Dale Eaglesham and Greg Land, and Jason Aaron!

Includes material reprinted from Captain America Vol.7 #13, Iron Man Vol.6 #12 and Thor: God of Thunder #12!

We often wonder what the future holds for us. Is it hope? Change? Or ever impending doom?! Which is exactly what our lighthearted duo will find out when they are taken into the future to serve trial for their crimes against humanity. Crimes against humanity? Really? These guys? How far has the future actually fallen when Mass and Effect are on trial? Find out all this and more and a secret so amazing it will blow your mind! Literally your skullcap will fall off. Money back guaranteed!

Having successfully saved the city of Mumbai while on their first case, Darius Mistry and Amos Golem, Paranormal Investigators for Hire, now contend with a most unusual second case. When the ghost of a dead woman hires them to solve her own murder, they find themselves tangling with family politics, demonic possessions, ancient dark magics, and -- the worst of all -- lawyers! The second issue of a 5-part series.

Music-obsessed teens struggle through the rise and Fall of Generation X and the Alternative Rock era of the 1990s. They learn that the bonds of friendship they thought were unbreakable have already begun to crack, and the music they thought they'd love forever has already started to fade.

Welcome to the final issue of our first anthology, Monty's World!

The 4th issue features 2 exciting stories. First up is part one of C.J. Walker, Bounty Hunter. The year is 2035 and C.J. is sent to Detroit to track down a rogue vampire cosplayer. And then there is Mercury, in what could be his last battle as he fights for justice.
With the Blood God destroyed and Havik neutralized, the champions of Earthrealm and Outworld attempt to return to their normal livesand new forces begin to conspire against them.
name: Blood Island Chapter 34: Epilogues

description:
Beryl's New Look

Beryl wants to change her trademark hairdo! What look will she go for? Find out in the latest New Stuff comic!
name: Beryl's New Look

description:
No Man's Land

A.S. Industries has been infiltrated, leaving its CEO Alvin Severnya nearly dead and the samples of his new experimental drug stolen. In his desperation Severnya uses a hidden syringe filled with the drug to save himself. Meanwhile, on the other end of the compound, a young man works late in his home when an explosion leaves the entire building in rubble and his survival in the hands of fate. Was it an accident Was it an act of terrorism ...or is it something more?
name: No Man's Land

description: It's the "Final Round" for our punchy Palooka Mortie Q. Suggs. In the heart of New York City he must face The Saviors of the City. In this final "No Holds Barred" bout Mortie must fight for his freedom and his very life.

Campfires II

Al-Kmer: fifteen years earlier. Marcus Blair - a miner working the Ridge - and Lan Shi - a refugee from Tsuki-Yama - harboured a secret love. But when there is a war on and tempers are short, secrets don't stay hidden for long.
name: Campfires II

description: A West Indies fisherman is captured and transported to a mysterious farm. Where he awakens and is confronted by strange priest-like beings called the Krouns. The Krouns brainwash and expose him to sensory deprivation methods that prepare him for a bizarre journey through the Parallaxium and into another universe.

The public is outraged over a police shooting as rumors of supernatural events spread throughout the city. Ian's mind is unhinged as he becomes consumed in his obsessive quest to develop psychic powers of his own. Will he be successful in this perilous endeavor? Or will his mind be lost to his nightmares?

Meet HELEN MARIE MITCHELL and THOMAS BECKER...

...or then again, maybe you should give them a moment.

SINCERELY, JACK

When an ominous letter makes its rounds through the streets of Paris the city has been warned; Jack is back! With the help of Inspector Shelby and a mysterious street thug, will they be able to solve the case before another murder occurs?
name: Sincerely, Jack

description: Despite having improved in her studies, princess lga still doesnt feel any closer to being a true princess like the others, and she still hasnt gotten a handle on diplomacy. But when the other princesses are targeted first by bandits, and then by political figureslga will have to shed her princess skin and become the bonny wee berserker of her people, or else the princesses are doomed!
name: Volume 2

description:
Homecoming

As the war wages, Mose B finds himself presented with an important mission, which could possibly turn the tide for the embattled American forces. Will he and his team accept the call to arms? Can they be the change needed in an ever-grinding war? See how the chips fall in issue 2...
name: Homecoming

description: The hottest new Superheroine, Reality, is finally unveiled!

Red continues her sojourn of humility and grace, drying off and meeting a frog. The Wolfe arrives at Grandmother's house. The aforementioned Frog pesters some birds about the Wolfe's whereabouts. The aforementioned birds subsequently discuss truth, justice, religion, and the American Way, upon the Frog's departure. A remarkable chapter, to be sure.
name: The Black Lands

description:
Rose is a girl who loves food, her family, food, her friends, food, hashtags, food and...did we mention food?

In this issue Rose rides an elephant, professes her love of chickens, finds out what she'd be willing to do for a potato and confesses her sins!

Mister Kaminsky

In which Sam meets his reclusive neighbor and begins to think that he is hiding something...
name: Mister Kaminsky

description: As Azure continues her quest to discover the truth about the mantle of The She Devil, her sister Ikara hatches a sinister plan. In a final battle the ultimate price will be paid and The She Devil will rise.

All lies are exposed when Lawrence and Legio pay drug kingpin William J. Nichols a night visit and learn the shocking truth. Deeply shaken, Lawrence retreats to his home which he still cannot enter because of his afterlife status. At his lowest moment, his youngest son, Nico, comes out into the yard and sits next to him on a backyard swing. Lawrence is astonished to learn that his young son can see and hear him.

Mistakes heal over time, at least that's what we're taught growing up. The information is written over with its passing, but sometimes a moment in time, even the briefest, most insignificant, moment can have a lasting effect. Like a seed thats planted, it can grow, sometimes branching into chaos.

The year is 2515 and the fruit thats been produced is toxic. The earth, and all it's systems, it's life, and resources are controlled by the ENFORCER. this is his creation. Now SINTHETIC holds the key to his immortality and a new source of technology that he'll stop at nothing to control. Welcome to issue three of Sinthetic.
With a serial killer seeming to have returned after 20 years of dormancy, Detective Chace continues his hunt for a killer that may be more than he seems.

name: Ralph Azam : Personne n'attrape jamais une rivire

description:
Chapter 2: The First Mission

Academic transfer, Carnelion, has arrived at the StarFortress of Atolista to continue his training to become a StarKnight. Having been acquainted with his new teacher and team mates he is quickly thrust in to action, his presence being requested aboard the Starbringer to be given his very first mission out in the field.

What was meant to be a standard scouting mission, will become the catalyst to an even greater plot that will shape the future of things to come...
name: Chapter 2: The First Mission

description: Toby has fallen victim to experimental weapons and now he must face his worst nightmares.

Imperium: Part 3

Zarran makes a move that could put the other slaves in the mines at risk. Alina continues to be creeped out by Doctor Murrell, who steps up his testing on her. Trovaar hosts an orgy that doesn't end well.
name: Imperium: Part 3

description: The series continues as a mystery begins to form about the function and purpose of The Machine - a facility which once provided power to huge portions of the country, converted to serve a hidden purpose.
name: Book Four

description:
Ronan Marino continues his investigation into the death of his girlfriend while finding himself in a new relationship.

Meanwhile new information on Karen's hidden life leaves Ronan questioning whether he should continue to risk his life in pursuit of her killer.
name: Part 4

description:
Slaughterhouse

Ambassador Benton Hawkes has refused a diplomatic posting to Mars, where the corporations running that planet and Earth need him for reasons yet unknown. Mistrustful of their motives, he ended his career and sought refuge on his beloved ranch - only to be targeted by forces looking to assassinate him. They are laying siege to his solitude and turning his heaven into hell.
name: Slaughterhouse

description:
What Can't Your Dad Do...?

For the third year in a row, Castor's father has been deemed the greatest hero on Earth! But his excitement fills some of the other students with self-doubts. Does WHOSE you are truly dictate WHO you are?
name: What Can't Your Dad Do...?

volume.name: Wonder Care Presents: The Kinder Guardians

description: Cover story is a reprint of the first story of The Flash #111 - Invasion of the Cloud Creatures! / Kid Flash: The Challenge of the Crimson Crows!
name: The Cloud Creatures

description:
The Adventures Of Air Raid Robertson

Air Raid Robertson is a quixotic aviator who dreams of becoming the foremost adventurer of his surreal world. Ever at his side, and usually spouting off sensible advice that's routinely ignored, is Robertson's faithful sidekick Ridley.

This e-book includes three stories...

"Welcome To The Jungle" - Air Raid Robertson and Ridley crash land in a mysterious jungle. Their only hope of getting home lies through a path containing anteater people, a giant spider, a sorcerer riding a giant turtle, and the fearsome might of the enigmatic Fantomah.

"Let Me Stand Next To Your Fire" - Subterranean monsters have invaded the surface world! No, it's not the mole people. No, it's not the sewer mutants. No, it isn't that weird guy who mind-controls rats. Whoever it is, they won't be able to conquer the upper crust until they get through Air Raid Robertson.

"People Get Ready" - A haven for racist old timey baddies who aren't allowed to appear in modern comics, The Island Of Misfit Supervillains contains the most fearsome gauntlet for our heroes yet! Can Air Raid Robertson and Ridley make it past the cannibals, banditos, injuns, coolies, and other assorted stereotypes? You'll only find out by purchasing comic.
name: Welcome To The Jungle; Let Me Stand Next To Your Fire; People Get Ready

description: It's deadline day at the small town newspaper, The Wise Progress. Joe Hale the editor and owner struggles with deadlines, writer's block and supernatural goings on while trying to keep a secret that will change his friends, family and his own life forever.
name: TPB

description: After God has abandoned Earth, the seven Archangels are forced to protect humanity against the rising legions of Hell. Can they pull themselves together to defeat Lucifer and his demons, or are they destined to suffer their own fall from grace?
name: Vol. 1

description:
The Avengers, Illuminati and Cabal have been battling to save their world while reality dies and time runs out around them but how did things get the way they are? Find out here, as the answers youve been waiting for are revealed! Cannonball and Smasher face their greatest adventure yet: parenthood! But can the new parents survive an encounter with the Shiar Imperial Guard? Sunspot takes on A.I.M. in the Savage Land as Starbrand and Nightmask face a surprising enemy, and Thor and Hyperion are unleashed! The Avengers fall as the Cabal rises and no world is safe as the march to the end times begins! Plus: Starbrand is losing his grip on his humanity! Can Nightmask bring him back to Earth? And can he stand against the cosmic fire of Kolobus?

Collects Avengers (2012) #34.2, Avengers World #17-21.
name: Volume 4

volume.name: Avengers World: Before Time Runs Out

description:
Barbara Gordon notices someone's interest in moths while working at the library.

She joins her father (Commissioner Gordon) at a speech showing the reporters that anyone can be like Batman, all they need is the right equipment. Before he can introduce a Batman-like suit with police scientist's versions of Batman's equipment, an attack happens by a man in an apparent Moth costume, calling himself Killer Moth.

A young woman, in that police version of a Batman costume, appears, announces herself to be Batgirl, and proceeds to take down the attacker.

Barbara, as Batgirl, attempts her first 'disappearing act' after the action is over, and bumps into Batman, who suggests that this be her only time as Batgirl.
Love happens to everyone...even on a dairy farm.

Researcher Bethany comes to Datar on a work trip. After some trouble, she is taken to the palace and is reuinited with the prince, Razul. Two years ago in England, Razul was a foreign exchange student and fell in love with Bethany. However, because of the difference in culture, Bethany rebuffed him. Bethany isn't happy being trapped in the palace, but is soon unable to withstand Razul's sweet advances...
name: Vol. 1

description:
Les envoteurs

Erotic Fantasy :

"In a distant future, the Moon has disappeared, depriving Earth of its protection against lucifrine, a radiation which causes mutations. It causes men to become cruel monsters and women become tree creatures, the dryads. For men, the only way to draw out the lucifrine that accumulates in them is to transmit it sexually into women. However, the process is potentially fatal to them. They have to first reach a paroxysm of pleasure. This is the role of the Spellbinders (Envoteurs), who are male geishas. Despite all efforts, humanity is dying off. Plants are disappearing and the number of women is in decline. Those who have survived are placed in bunkers, guarded by men who are trying to save this ultimate parcel of humanity.

Melin is one of them..."

"Dans un lointain futur, la Lune a disparu, privant la Terre de sa protection contre la lucifrine, une radiation qui a provoqu des mutations, la fois chez les hommes, qui rgressent en monstres sans conscience, et chez les femmes, devenues des femmes-plantes, les Dryades. Pour les hommes, le seul moyen d'vacuer la lucifrien accumule en eux est de la transmettre sexuellement aux femmes. Un processus qui peut leur tre fatal. C'est pourquoi il faut au pralable les amener au paroxysme du plaisir. C'est le rle des Envoteurs, des geishas mles. Malgr tout, l'humanit dprit. La flore disparat au fur et mesure que le nombre de femmes dcrot. Celles qui ont survcu ont t places dans des bunkers, gardes par des hommes qui tentent ainsi de sauver cette ultime parcelle de l'humanit.

Mlina est l'une d'elle...

"Dryade" est un projet de socio-financement financ sur sandawe.com."

"Dryade" is a crowdfounding project finance on sandawe.com"

El Guapo in Yeah Reicht!, or An Unbearable Situation

When bears are being stolen from zoos all across New Jersey, El Guapo and the Agents of D.U.M.P. are called into investigate.
name: El Guapo in Yeah Reicht!, or An Unbearable Situation

description: Ethan is on vacation at a resort in the Caribbean after having a bad time all because of a rumor that intimated his involvement with the sheikh's wife. It is there that he meets Eve, a beautiful and rich Greek woman with irresistibly attractive eyes. Ethan wants to avoid getting into trouble with women and tries to stay away from Eve. But one night while he's sleeping in his room, he hears someone scream at the beach house. He rushes over and finds Eve shaking, half-naked!
name: Hot-Blooded Husbands II

description:
Eleven of New Zealand's finest cartoonists take a speculative stab at the looming threat of climate change in this thoughtful, provoking and sometimes hilarious, comic collection.

With tales ranging from washed-up celebrity polar bears, to giant post-apocalyptic crabs, High Water takes the reader on a thrilling romp through a warming world. Contributors include Dylan Horrocks (Hicksville, Sam Zabel and the Magic Pen), Sarah Laing, Chris Slane and many more.

Grayhaven's graphic novel mash-up anthology proudly presents WESTERN HORROR. We've put fan favorite genres together to create one 60 page collection of stories with 8 added pinup pages!

Whether you're a fan of skeletal cowboys, Native American mythological beasts, or dark dealings with charming devils, this collection has a story for you!
